To use this app you must provide 11 chemical properties of your wine (12 for the import data section). This app works more like a fast minimalistic service than an usual app, we provide on spot quality analysis of your wine and tell you based on a range from 3 to 9 how good is your wine and based on that estimation how much you can sell your wine on the market. Our artificial taster is based on the data from Portugal the place where the finest wines are made.
 Chemical tests always give a recommended interval for your wine but let's don't forget about the sensory testing (wine tasting) where a professional tastes your wine. Human bias is common nowadays but what if you could have an artificial taster who will always taste your wine correctly? 
 For this service to give you the best predictions you must provide 11 chemical data of your wine:

 1. Fixed acidity (values between 3.8 and 14.2 g/l)
 2. Volatile acidity(between 0 and 2 g/l)
 3. Citric acid (between 0 and 2 g/l)
 4. Residual sugar (between 0 and 150 g/l)
 5. Chlorides (between 0 and 2 g/l)
 6. Free sulfur dioxide(between 0 and 200 g/l)
 7. Total sulfur dioxide(between 0 and 500 g/l)
 8. Density (must be close to 0.99-1 g/cm^3)
 9. pH (between 2.5 and 4)
 10. Sulphates (between 0 and 1.5)
 11. Alcohol(between 8% and 15%)
